name: SavageBot
0:
”Alexa, ask savage bot to be a pro”
”Alexa, ask savage bot to show us how its done”
”Alexa, ask savage bot to be savage”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: savage bot
des:
Savage Bot is a fun skill who when invoked gives witty one-liners as replies.
To invoke savage bot, you migt use the invocation name "Savage Bot" with prefixes like open, launch etc.
Some Sample Utterances are as follows:
1. "be a pro"
2. "show us how its done"
3. "display savageness"
4. "show savageness"
5. "be you"
6. "be savage"

Example: Ask Savage Bot to be savage
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
